alert.note: Alert for Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 27 at 7:28PM MDT until May 27 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN ZIEBACH COUNTY... At 728 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles west of Intersection of Highway 63 and BIA Road 8, or 10 miles southwest of Eagle Butte, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Dupree, South Eagle Butte, Intersection of Highway 63 and BIA Road 8 and southern Cheyenne River Reservation. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
